summary: Adds a powerful enemy(12000 health, sword and bow that do 400 damage) to the game. After claim his powerful weapons. Enchant them to make an unbeatable weapon.
descriptionHtml:
General Aberdeen a famous general of Hammerfell has come to test the mettle of the Dragonborn be prepared as he seems to have gone mad in his old age and journey to Skyrim. He will attack without warning so be prepared for a brutal fight with a once great general gone awry.

General Aberdeen can be found in Whiterun market. Bring lots of friends to this fight to distract him but be warned he will probably kill them as his weapons are dangerously fast.
author: James Michael P Ellis-Trenholm
